text: Noah "Shark" Robertson (born July 28, 1983) is an American drummer, comedian, and writer. He is most notable for being one of the founding members of The Browning. He was also the drummer of Motograter from 2013 to 2017. http://themetalden.com/?p=37143 Robertson is currently the drummer for Jeffrey Nothing, former vocalist and founding member of Mushroomhead.https://www.theprp.com/2018/09/07/news/ex-mushroomhead-members- jeffrey-nothing-thomas-church-return-with-new-song-fragile- mind/https://www.theprp.com/2018/11/16/news/jeffrey-nothing-ex-mushroomhead- releases-dead-space-dead-inside/ In July 2011, he founded Swimming With Sharks Records. The label roster includes Eye of the Enemy (Australia) and Hellbent, among other acts from around the world. Past artists include Mouth Of The Serpent, Aechoes, Laconic, Blindfolded and Led To the Woods, among others. On August 29, 2016 Robertson launched Zombie Shark Records and announced his first signings as Keychain from Montreal and Darkc3ll from Australia. http://bravewords.com/news/montreals-keychain-sign-with-motograter-ex-the- browning-drummer-noah-shark-robertsons-zombie-shark-records-new-ep-due-in- september-prime-time-music-video-streaminghttp://www.mirp411.com/news/noah- shark-robertson-motograter-ex-the-browning-announces-launch-of-zombie-shark- recordshttp://top40-charts.com/news.php?nid=121402 The Zombie Shark Records roster has included Dirty Machine,http://www.metalunderground.com/news/details.cfm?newsid=134719 Keychain,http://bravewords.com/news/montreals-keychain-sign-with-motograter- ex-the-browning-drummer-noah-shark-robertsons-zombie-shark-records-new-ep-due- in-september-prime-time-music-video-streaming Darkcell, Lethal Injektion, NoSelf,https://newnoisemagazine.com/noself-casting-stones-video/ Riksha,http://www.metal-temple.com/site/news/view/general_news/riksha-new- album.htm?filter=1%2C8%25.. The Black Crown, 10/31,http://www.heavymetalicu.com/wrath-featuring-tommy-church-mushroomhead/ Natas Lived, JUNK,https://musicjunkiepress.com/rock/billy-blairs-band-junk- signs-zombie-shark-records/ The Rift,https://www.puremzine.com/the-rift-rock- narcotic-single-review/ Promidal, Krehatedhttp://shockwavemagazine.com/swedens-krehated-unleash-new-video- awaken-ignorance-new-album-out-the-venomous-mind-via-zombie-shark-records/ and more. In August 2016, Thom Hazaert brought Robertson on as Marketing Director of EMP Label Group, the new record label from David Ellefson of Megadeth fame. Thom is currently serving as Director of Operations and Head of A&R; at EMP and has served as a consultant for Zombie Shark Records. In 2018, Robertson officially began his stand-up comedy career.https://rocknloadmag.com/news/shower-sharks-official-trailer-release/ He made his Comedy Store debut in Hollywood, California on June 4, 2018. In September 2018 it was announced that Robertson joined forces with Jeffrey Nothing and Thomas Church following their departure from Mushroomhead.http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/former-mushroomhead-members- jeffrey-nothing-and-thomas-church-rejoin-forces-in-nothing/ ==References== Category:Living people Category:American industrial musicians Category:1983 births Category:American heavy metal drummers Category:Musicians from Texas Category:American rock drummers Category:Snot (band) members Category:21st- century American drummers
title: Noah Robertson
